synopsis.text: Syrup, a fairy residing in the enchanting realm of Aquafall, teams up with three young dragon girls to protect their lush, water-filled world from malevolent creatures unleashed by meteorite showers. Together, they form the Aquafall Defense Force, a valiant team dedicated to safeguarding their home. The dragon girls – Leviathan, Bahamut, and Jörmungandr – embark on a journey of growth and self-discovery as they join forces with Syrup to vanquish the invading threats and restore peace to their once idyllic world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
